evidence_example.title: MiWi P2P Demo
evidence_example.small_descr: This example shows how to use the MiWi P2P protocol with the Flex Demoboard.
evidence_example.long_descr:
This demo can be used to show the usage of the MiWi P2P protocol in combination with the Erika RTOS, the FLEX Demo Daughter Board and the PICDEM Z 2.4 GHz daughter card.

MiWi 2P2 is a wireless protocol developed by Microchip (www.microchip.com) and based on the IEEE802.15.4 standard.

This example is derived from that provided by Microchip in the MiWiP2P distribution.

Usage:
  • Button S1 is used to change the message to transmit: "Hello" or "P2P";
  • Button S2 is used to send a message;
  • Button S3 is used to initialize a periodic transmission of messages.
